project_name.justification: The text announces a lease agreement at the 'Rio Tinto U.S. Borax mine site in Boron, California'.

company_name.justification: The project is the 'Rio Tinto U.S. Borax mine site'. The company is identified as Rio Tinto in the text: '...announces the signing of a surface lease agreement with Rio Tinto...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The acquirer of the lease is Element Resources. The text identifies its CEO: 'Steve Meheen, Founder, Chairman & CEO of Element Resources.'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The transaction is a 'surface lease agreement' for the development of a hydrogen facility, not an acquisition of an ownership interest in the mine.

primary_commodity.justification: The project is the 'U.S. Borax mine site', and Borax is a primary mineral source of Boron (B).

verified_article_link.justification: The article is about the U.S. Borax project, but no URL was provided in the source text.

currency.justification: The detailed quote section associated with Rio Tinto lists a dividend in USD: 'Dividend Amount: 2.25 USD'.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The announcement of the 'surface lease agreement' does not contain any financial details or payment amounts.

share_payments_raw.justification: The announcement of the 'surface lease agreement' does not contain any financial details or payment amounts.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The announcement of the 'surface lease agreement' does not contain any financial details or payment amounts.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The transaction is a lease agreement, not a share issuance.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued as part of the lease agreement.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The agreement is for the 'development of a green hydrogen production facility', not for mineral exploration.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The agreement is for the 'development of a green hydrogen production facility', not for mineral exploration.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Royalty or similar royalty was mentioned as part of the lease agreement terms.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text mentions a 'very large acreage footprint' but does not provide a specific numerical value for the leased area.

coverage_area_unit.justification: No area value was provided, as the text only mentions a 'very large acreage footprint'.

resource_size.justification: The text does not contain a mineral resource estimate for the project.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer (lessee) is Element Resources, for which no ticker is provided in the text. The authoritative ticker (RIO) and exchange (NYSE) belong to Rio Tinto, which is the seller (lessor) in this transaction.
